Detailed Description

CellNB is a cell without boundaries(No Boundaries).

MGCellNB ia an abstract class and the super class of MGBVertex, MGEdge, and MGCell. There are two types of cells. One is parameter cell(pcell) and the other is binder cell(bcell). They are exclusive, that is, if a cell is a parameter cell, the cell cannot be binder cell and vice versa. Parameter cell is a constituent of a complex and MGCellNB's are stored in MGComplex. Binder cell is a binder of parameter cells. Plural cells are connected through a binder.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

MGCellNB::MGCellNB ( const MGCellNB &  cell  ) 

Copy constructor.

Result cell is not a member of any complex. Partners of cell will not be copied.

MGCellNB::MGCellNB ( const MGGeometry &  geo  ) 

CellNB of whole geometry(no boundary).

The second form that input MGGeometry* takes the ownership of the geo into the MGCellNB, must not delete the object and the object must be newed one.

MGCellNB::MGCellNB ( MGGeometry *  geo,
MGCellNB *  binder 
)

This constructor takes the ownership of geo.

Construct a parameter cell whose binder cell is 'binder'.

Parameters:
binder Can be null.

Member Function Documentation

void MGCellNB::add_partner ( const MGCellBase &  partner  ) 

Add partner to this binder cell.

Can change pcell(of no binder) to binder cell. This must be newed binder since this pointer will be registered in the partner's binder pointer.

virtual MGCellNB* MGCellNB::clone ( MGCellMap &  cmap  )  const [protected, virtual]

Generate a new MGCellBase pointer by newing the original MGCellBase.

This is a proprietry routine of MGComplex copy. Copy all boundary data, (but does not copy own binder cell relation) and register boundary binder association of new and old into cmap.

Implements MGCellBase.

Reimplemented in MGBVertex, and MGCell.

virtual MGCellNB* MGCellNB::clone (  )  const [pure virtual]

Make a clone of the cell.

clone() does not copy the binder cell relation.

Implements MGCellBase.

Implemented in MGBVertex, MGCell, and MGEdge.

virtual MGCellNB* MGCellNB::clone_binder ( const MGCellBase &  c  )  const [pure virtual]

Make a clone of this(this is a binder), and set binder and member partner relation between the new binder and the cell c.

Implemented in MGBVertex, MGCell, and MGEdge.

virtual MGCellNB* MGCellNB::clone_without_boundaries (  )  const [pure virtual]

Make a clone of the cell without boundaries.

clone_without_boundaries() does not copy the binder cell relation.

Implements MGCellBase.

Implemented in MGBVertex, MGCell, and MGEdge.

virtual void MGCellNB::draw3DVertex (  )  const [pure virtual]

Draw 3D point(vertex) in world coordinates.

The object is converted to point(s) and is drawn. This is valid only for topology objects or MGPoint.

Implements MGCellBase.

Implemented in MGBVertex, MGCell, and MGEdge.

MGGeometry* MGCellNB::free_extent (  ) 

Free(but does not delete) the extent geometry.

Freed extent is returned as the function's return value.

MGComplex* MGCellNB::free_from_parent (  ) 

Free from membership of the parent complex.

free_from_parent() does not maintain the box of the complex this cell belonged to. And so, users of free_from_parent() must do it.

virtual MGCellNB* MGCellNB::make_binder (  )  const [pure virtual]

Make a binder cell of this parameter cell.

Returned is the binder pointer generated by new. The binder has no geometry, only has binder and parameter cell relationship.

Implements MGCellBase.

Implemented in MGBVertex, MGCell, and MGEdge.

virtual std::vector<const MGCellNB*> MGCellNB::neighbours (  )  const [pure virtual]

Obtain all the neighbours.

The neighbours do not contain this cell except when this cell is connected to this cell itself(closed cell).

Implemented in MGBVertex, MGCell, and MGEdge.

virtual MGCellNB& MGCellNB::operator= ( const MGCellNB &  gel2  )  [virtual]

Assignment.

When the leaf object of this and cb2 are not equal, this assignment does nothing.

MGCellNB& MGCellNB::set_cellnb ( const MGCellNB &  cell2  )  [protected]

Assignment.

does not change binder and partner relation, does not change parent complex.

MGComplex* MGCellNB::m_parent_complex [mutable, protected]
